ModMetaData.name: SolarsStuffed
ModMetaData.author: Skullywag
ModMetaData.description:
Changes vanilla solar panels so that they can be made with stuff.
Energy Health Flammable Beauty Steel panel: 1700W 300 20% -10 Silver panel: 1900W 210 20% -10 Gold panel: 2100W 180 20% -10 Plasteel panel: 2300W 840 10% -10 Uranium panel: 2500W 750 0% -10
